AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.label: astral pulse
AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can harness astral energy, storing it within their bodies for various supernatural abilities.
AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.resourceDescription: Current stored astral energy. This energy can be used to power various supernatural abilities.
